item.title: Breaking the Silos: Psychological Safety
item.description: The topic of our next gathering is psychological safety in tech companies. As usual, we bring you an introduction to the matter followed by a couple of practical case studies. You’ll have the opportunity to hear from industry experts and connect with like-minded individuals from the community.

item.title: Breaking the Silos: Inclusion
item.description: At this meetup, we focus on inclusion in tech companies. Discover new strategies to foster diversity, equity and belonging in your organisation, hear from industry experts, and connect with like-minded individuals from the community.

item.title: Breaking the Silos: Neurodiversity
item.description: Our first meetup focuses on Neurodiversity (ADHD, ASD, intellectual giftedness, etc.), featuring four live keynote speakers.
